title: Lady Killer
description: A serial killer is targeting women TV reporters and leaving voicemail for journalist Susanne Amanti claiming the murders are for her. With a Media blackout and the clock ticking, FBI profiler Tom Gracie and Homicide Detective Victoria Scott team up to catch the brutal and sadistic killer.Available at Barnes & Noblehttp://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/lady-...
author: David Krae
